knl_notifier_alert_target.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_target (
	alert_no int not null,
	target_type varchar(1) default 'I' not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	template_no int default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_tgt primary key(alert_no, target_type),
	constraint fk_knl_ntf_target_to_alert
	foreign key(alert_no)
	references knl_notifier_alert(alert_no),
	constraint fk_knl_ntf_target_to_tmpl
	foreign key(template_no)
	references knl_formatter_template(template_no)
)

knl_security_question.definition:
create table knl_security_question (
	question_no int not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	question_text varchar(511) not null,
	sequence_no int default 0 not null,
	weightage smallint default 100 not null,
	category varchar(20) not null,
	user_defined varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_qns primary key (question_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_qns_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_forgotpass_config.definition:
create table knl_security_forgotpass_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	captcha_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	device_privacy_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geolocation_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geohistory_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	userid_recovery_email_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	recovery_type varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	sec_qns_weightage smallint default 100 not null,
	recovery_email_template_no int default 0 not null,
	display_userid varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_forgotpass_cfg primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_forgotpass_def
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_notifier_alert_inst_lck.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_inst_lck (
	lock_id varchar(127) not null,
	instance_no bigint not null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_inst_lck primary key(lock_id, instance_no)
)

knl_security_profile.definition:
create table knl_security_profile (
   profile_no int not null,
   domain_no int not null,
   profile_id varchar(50) not null,
   description varchar(255) null,
   level_no smallint not null,
   created_on bigint null,
   updated_on bigint null,
   created_by int null,
   updated_by int null,
   constraint pk_knl_sec_profile primary key (profile_no),
   constraint fk_knl_sec_prof_pno
   foreign key (domain_no)
   references  knl_security_definition(domain_no),
   constraint fk_knl_sec_prof_lno
   foreign key (level_no)
   references  knl_organization_level(level_no)
)

knl_security_function_group.definition:
create table knl_security_function_group (
	group_no int not null,
	group_id varchar(50) not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_func_grp primary key (group_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_funcgrp_to_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_page_cfg_ovrd.definition:
create table knl_security_page_cfg_ovrd (
	batch_no int default 0 not null,
	domain_id varchar(50) not null,
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	version varchar(20) not null,
	page_id varchar(50) not null,
	enabled varchar(1) not null,
	access_type varchar(1) not null,
	policies varchar(255) not null,
	auto_renewal_enabled varchar(1) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_page_cfg_ovrd primary key (batch_no, domain_id, product_id, version, page_id)
)

knl_security_swtchble_profile.definition:
create table knl_security_swtchble_profile (
	profile_no int not null,
	switchable_profile_no int not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_prof_switch primary key (profile_no, switchable_profile_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_switch_prof_pri
	foreign key (profile_no)
	references knl_security_profile(profile_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_switch_prof_sec
	foreign key (switchable_profile_no)
	references knl_security_profile(profile_no)
)

app_domain_definition.definition:
create table app_domain_definition (
	domain_no int not null,
	domain_id varchar(50) not null,
	title varchar(255) not null,
	ecosystem_id int not null,
	owner_id int not null,
	client_id varchar(20) not null,
	pulse_id int not null,
	environment_id varchar(10) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_app_domain_def primary key (domain_no)
)

knl_security_function_grp_map.definition:
create table knl_security_function_grp_map (
	group_no int not null,
	function_no int not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_func_grp_map primary key (group_no, function_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_funcgrpmap_grp
	foreign key (group_no)
	references knl_security_function_group (group_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_funcgrpmap_func
	foreign key (function_no)
	references knl_security_function (function_no)
)

knl_security_function.definition:
create table knl_security_function (
	function_no int not null,
	product_no smallint default 1 not null,
	function_id varchar(50) not null,
	resource_no int not null,
	control_no int not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_func primary key (function_no),
	constraint fk_knl_security_func_to_res
	foreign key (resource_no)
	references knl_security_resource (resource_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_func_ctrl
	foreign key (control_no)
	references knl_security_control (control_no)
)

knl_security_definition.definition:
create table knl_security_definition (
	domain_no int not null,
	auth_type varchar(3) not null,
	auth_class varchar(511) null,
	user_attr_refresh_type varchar(1) default 'M' not null,
	authorization_policies varchar(50) default 'ALL' not null,
	authorization_policies_options varchar(50) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_def primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_def_details
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_page_config.definition:
create table knl_security_page_config (
	page_no  int not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	access_type varchar(1) not null,
	policies varchar(255) not null,
	auto_renewal_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_page_cfg primary key (page_no, domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_secpage_auth_dmn 
	foreign key(domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition(domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_secpage_auth_pageno
	foreign key (page_no)
	references knl_security_page(page_no)
)

knl_core_entity_config.definition:
create table knl_core_entity_config (
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	entity_id varchar(50) not null,
	config_id varchar(50) not null,
	sub_entity_id varchar(50) not null,
	description varchar(255) null,
	entity_value varchar(1023) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_cor_ent_cfg primary key (domain_no, entity_id, config_id, sub_entity_id),
	constraint fk_knl_cor_ent_cfg_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_userlogin_hist.definition:
create table knl_security_userlogin_hist (
	user_no int not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	logged_on bigint not null,
	token_used varchar(255) null,
	latitude decimal(12,5) null,
	longitude decimal(12,5) null,
	user_agent varchar(255) null,
	public_ip varchar(127) null,
	referer varchar(127) null,
	device_type varchar(1) null,
	device_name varchar(127) null,
	browser_type varchar(127) null,
	browser_version varchar(20) null,
	network_ip varchar(127) null,
	other_details varchar(3999) null,
	constraint fk_knl_sec_usr_hist_to_usr
	foreign key (user_no) 
	references knl_security_user (user_no)
)

knl_notifier_alert.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert (
	alert_no int not null,
	entity varchar(127) not null,
	alert varchar(127) default '' not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	severity varchar(1) null,
	actionable varchar(1) null,
	processing_mode varchar(1) null,
	mode_details varchar(255) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt primary key(alert_no)
)

knl_license_domain_products.definition:
create table knl_license_domain_products (
	domain_no int not null,
	product_no smallint not null,
	created_on bigint null,
    updated_on bigint null,
    created_by int null,
    updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_lic_dom_product primary key(domain_no, product_no),
	constraint fk_knl_lic_dmnprod_prod
    foreign key(product_no)
    references knl_license_product(product_no),
	constraint fk_knl_lic_prod_to_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_user_preference.definition:
create table knl_security_user_preference (
	user_no int not null,
	pref_id varchar(127) not null,
	pref_value varchar(3999) null,
	category varchar(20) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_usr_pref primary key (user_no, pref_id),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_usr_def_pref
	foreign key (user_no)
	references knl_security_user (user_no)
)

knl_import_config.definition:
create table knl_import_config (
	config_no smallint not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	config_id varchar(50) not null,
	import_type varchar(1) not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	batch_size smallint default 100 not null,
	field_count smallint not null,
	header_enabled varchar(1) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,  
	constraint pk_knl_impt_cfg primary key (config_no),
	constraint fk_knl_impt_cfg_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_password_config.definition:
create table knl_security_password_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	encryption_algo varchar(50) null,
	min_length smallint not null,
	max_length smallint not null,
	min_lower_case smallint not null,
	max_lower_case smallint not null,
	min_upper_case smallint not null,
	max_upper_case smallint not null,
	min_alphabet smallint not null,
	max_alphabet smallint not null,
	min_numeric smallint not null,
	max_numeric smallint not null,
	min_special_char smallint not null,
	max_special_char smallint not null,
	user_id_close_chk_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	email_id_close_chk_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	max_previous_password_check varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	max_invalid_pass_rset_atmpts varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_pass_cfg primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_pass_cfg_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_user_question.definition:
create table knl_security_user_question (
	user_no int not null,
	question_no int not null,
	answer varchar(255) not null,
	last_asked bigint not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_usr_qns primary key (user_no, question_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_usr_qns_usr
	foreign key (user_no) 
	references knl_security_user (user_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_usr_qns_to_qns
	foreign key (question_no)
	references knl_security_question (question_no)
)

knl_security_project_menu.definition:
create table knl_security_project_menu (
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	profile_no int default 0 not null,
	menu_id  varchar(100) not null,
	parent_menu_id varchar(100) null,
	page_no int  not null,
	seq_no smallint default 0 not null,
	menu_text varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	preferred varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_proj_mnu primary key (domain_no, profile_no, menu_id, page_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_projmenu_dmn 
	foreign key(domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition(domain_no),
    constraint fk_knl_sec_projmenu_pno
    foreign key(profile_no)
    references knl_security_profile(profile_no)
)

knl_license_product_load.definition:
create table knl_license_product_load (
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	version varchar(20) not null,
	type varchar(20) not null,
	chunk_no smallint not null,
	content varchar(2047) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_lic_prod_load primary key (product_id, version, type, chunk_no)
)

knl_security_user.definition:
create table knl_security_user (
	user_no int not null,
	domain_no int not null,
	user_id varchar(100) not null,
	case_sensitive_user_id varchar(100) not null,
	password varchar(511) null,
	unit_id varchar(50) not null,
    first_name varchar(50) null,
    last_name varchar(50) null,
    middle_name varchar(50) null,
    display_name varchar(150) null,
	locale varchar(10) null,
	email_id varchar(255) null,
	phone_no varchar(20) null,
	mobile_no varchar(20) null,
	recovery_email_id varchar(255) null,
	node_level_user varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	mobile_carrier varchar(50) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_user primary key (user_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_user_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition(domain_no)
)

app_schema_version.definition:
create table app_schema_version (
  db_version varchar(20) not null,
  app_version varchar(30) not null,
  app_version_type varchar(10) not null,
  db_start_tskey bigint not null,
  db_end_tskey bigint not null,
  last_update_time timestamp default current timestamp not null,
  constraint pk_app_schema_version primary key (db_version,app_version,db_start_tskey)
)

knl_security_resetpass_config.definition:
create table knl_security_resetpass_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	captcha_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	device_privacy_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geolocation_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geohistory_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	reset_type varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	sec_qns_weightage smallint default 100 not null,
	delegate_reset_allowed varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	display_userid varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	reset_email_template_no int default 0 not null,
	delegate_success_url  varchar(511) null,
	delegate_two_factor_type varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_resetpass_cfg primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_resetpass_def
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_userpass_hist.definition:
create table knl_security_userpass_hist (
	user_no int not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	password varchar(511) null,
	encryption_algo varchar(50) null,
	created_by int null,
	constraint fk_knl_sec_usrpass_hist_uno
	foreign key(user_no)
	references knl_security_user(user_no)
)

app_domain_definition_load.definition:
create table app_domain_definition_load (
	domain_no int not null,
	type varchar(20) not null,
	chunk_no smallint not null,
	content varchar(2047) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_app_dmn_def_load primary key (domain_no, type, chunk_no)
)

knl_notifier_alert_inst_hist.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_inst_hist (
	instance_no bigint not null,
	alert_no int not null,
	status varchar(1) default 'U' not null,
	metadata varchar(3999) null,
	lgm_type varchar(1) null,
	target_status varchar(20) null,
    retry_count smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_hinst primary key(instance_no)
)

knl_import_file_status.definition:
create table knl_import_file_status (
	file_no int not null,
	record_count int default -1 not null,
	status varchar(1) not null,
	success_count int default -1 not null,
	fail_count int default -1 not null,
	pending_count int default -1 not null,
	updated_on bigint not null,
	updated_by int not null,    
	constraint pk_knl_impt_fl_stat primary key (file_no),
	constraint fk_impt_file_stus_file
	foreign key (file_no)
	references knl_import_file_master (file_no)
)

knl_organization_level.definition:
create table knl_organization_level(
    level_no smallint not null,
	domain_no int not null,
	level_id varchar(127) not null,
	description varchar(255)not null,
	org_level smallint not null,
	created_on bigint null,
    updated_on bigint null,
    created_by int null,
    updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_org_level primary key (level_no),
	foreign key(domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition(domain_no)
)

knl_notifier_consumer_override.definition:
create table knl_notifier_consumer_override (
	consumer_no int not null,
	entity varchar(127) not null,
	event varchar(127) default '' not null,
	behavior varchar(1) default 'S' not null,
	execution_order smallint default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_cons_ovrd primary key(consumer_no, entity, event)
)

knl_messaging_bcast_audience.definition:
create table knl_messaging_bcast_audience (
	bcast_no bigint not null,
	audience_type varchar(1) not null,
	audience_id varchar(127) not null,
    created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_msg_bcast_aud primary key (bcast_no, audience_type, audience_id),
	constraint fk_knl_msg_bcast_aud_bno
	foreign key (bcast_no)
	references knl_messaging_bcast (bcast_no)
)

knl_core_domain_defaults.definition:
create table knl_core_domain_defaults (
	domain_no int not null,
	date_format varchar(30) null,
	time_format varchar(20) null,
	datetime_format varchar(50) null,
	datetimemilli_format varchar(60) null,
	shortday_format varchar(10) null,
	locale varchar(10) null,
	supported_locales varchar(127) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_cor_dmn_dftls primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_dmn_dflts_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_core_keycode.definition:
create table knl_core_keycode (
	code_no int  not null,
	name varchar(100) not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	cache_type varchar(1) default 'S' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_cor_keycode primary key (code_no)
)

knl_formatter_template.definition:
create table knl_formatter_template (
	template_no int not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	name varchar(100) not null,
	category varchar(20) not null,
	template_type varchar(1) default 'T' not null,
	template_path varchar(511) null,
	template_content varchar(1023) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_fmt_tmpl primary key (template_no),
	constraint fk_knl_fmt_tmpl_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_license_product_module.definition:
create table knl_license_product_module (
	module_no smallint not null,
    product_no smallint default 1 not null,
    module_id varchar(50) not null,
    description varchar(255) null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
    created_on bigint null,
    updated_on bigint null,
    created_by int null,
    updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_lic_prod_mod primary key (module_no),
    constraint fk_knl_lic_mdl_prodno
    foreign key(product_no)
    references knl_license_product(product_no)
)

app_domain_details.definition:
create table app_domain_details (
	domain_no int not null,
	base_url varchar(511) null,
	mount_directory varchar(511) null,
	jdbc_name varchar(127) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_app_domain_det primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_app_dmn_def_det
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_core_keyvalue.definition:
create table knl_core_keyvalue (
	code_no int not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	value varchar(127) not null,
	description varchar(255) null,
	sequence_no smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_cor_keyvalue primary key (code_no, domain_no, value),
	constraint fk_knl_cor_key_code_val
	foreign key (code_no)
	references knl_core_keycode (code_no),
	constraint fk_knl_core_key_code_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_import_staging_record_data.definition:
create table knl_import_staging_record_data (
	record_no bigint not null,
	field_index smallint not null,
	field_value varchar(256) null,
	constraint pk_knl_impt_stg_recdata primary key (record_no, field_index),
	constraint fk_impt_stg_rcd_fld_rcd
	foreign key (record_no)
	references knl_import_staging_record (record_no)
)

knl_security_control.definition:
create table knl_security_control (
	control_no int not null,
	product_no smallint default 1 not null,
	control_id varchar(50) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	applicability int default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_ctrl primary key (control_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_ctrl_res
	foreign key (applicability)
	references knl_security_resource (resource_no)
)

knl_messaging_bcast.definition:
create table knl_messaging_bcast (
	bcast_no bigint not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	bcast_type varchar(1) not null,
	display_type varchar(1) not null,
	title varchar(100) not null,
	bcast_text varchar(3999) not null,
	start_on bigint not null,
	end_on bigint not null,
	sequence_no smallint not null,
	status varchar(1) default 'A' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_msg_bcast primary key (bcast_no),
	constraint fk_knl_msg_bcast_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_time_config.definition:
create table knl_security_time_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	device_type varchar(1) not null,
	lease_period smallint default 0 not null,
	renewal_period smallint default 0 not null,
	renewal_type varchar(1) not null,
	renewal_grace_period smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_time_cfg primary key (domain_no, device_type),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_time_cfg_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_unauth_session.definition:
create table knl_security_unauth_session (
	token varchar(255) not null,
	category varchar(50) not null, 
	expires_on bigint not null,
	domain_no int null,
	details varchar(3999) null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_unauth_sess primary key (token)
)

knl_import_staging_record.definition:
create table knl_import_staging_record (
	record_no bigint not null,
	file_no int not null,
	file_record_no int not null,
	status varchar(1) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_impt_stg_rec primary key (record_no),
	constraint fk_impt_stg_rcd_file
	foreign key (file_no)
	references knl_import_file_master (file_no)
)

knl_security_user_profile.definition:
create table knl_security_user_profile (
    user_no int not null,
    profile_no int not null,
    created_on bigint null,
    updated_on bigint null,
    created_by int null,
    updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_usr_prof primary key (user_no, profile_no),
    constraint fk_knl_sec_user_prof_uno
    foreign key (user_no)
    references knl_security_user(user_no),
    constraint fk_knl_sec_user_pno
    foreign key (profile_no)
    references knl_security_profile(profile_no)
)

knl_security_profile_perm.definition:
create table knl_security_profile_perm (
	profile_no int not null,
	function_no int not null,
	negation varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_prof_perm primary key (profile_no, function_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_prof_perm_fno
	foreign key(function_no)
	references knl_security_function(function_no),
    constraint fk_knl_sec_prof_perm_pno
    foreign key(profile_no)
    references knl_security_profile(profile_no)
)

knl_globalization_pair.definition:
create table knl_globalization_pair (
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	i18n_key varchar(255) not null,
	locale varchar(10) not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	value varchar(2048) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_i18n_pair primary key (product_id, i18n_key, locale, domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_i18n_domain
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_auth_token.definition:
create table knl_security_auth_token (
	token varchar(255) not null,
	user_no int not null,
	issued_on bigint not null,
	expires_on bigint not null,
	created_on bigint not null,
	renewed_on bigint default 0 not null,
	requested_by int default 0 not null,
	renewed_by int default 0 not null,
	renewal_count smallint default 0 not null,
	scope varchar(50) null,
	audience varchar(100) null,
	parent_token varchar(255) null,
	delete_on_expiry varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_auth_tkn primary key (token),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_token_user
	foreign key (user_no)
	references knl_security_user (user_no)
)

knl_security_definition_attr.definition:
create table knl_security_definition_attr (
	domain_no int not null,
	attribute_id varchar(127) not null,
	attribute_value varchar(1023) null,
	attribute_type varchar(1) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_def_attr primary key (domain_no, attribute_id),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_def_attr
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_notifier_alert_linst_hist.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_linst_hist (
	instance_no bigint not null,
	metadata_key varchar(127) not null,
	metadata_value varchar(3999) null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_hlinst primary key(instance_no, metadata_key)
)

knl_notifier_consumer.definition:
create table knl_notifier_consumer (
	consumer_no int not null,
	consumer_type varchar(1) default 'J' not null,
	name varchar(255) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_cons primary key(consumer_no)
)

app_bootup_properties.definition:
create table app_bootup_properties (
	name varchar(255) not null,
	value varchar(2047) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_app_bootup_prop primary key (name)
)

knl_security_func_cfg_ovrd.definition:
create table knl_security_func_cfg_ovrd (
	batch_no int default 0 not null,
	domain_id varchar(50) not null,
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	version varchar(20) not null,
	function_id varchar(50) not null,
	enabled varchar(1) not null,
	configurable varchar(1) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_fun_cfg_ovrd primary key (batch_no, domain_id, product_id, version, function_id)
)

knl_notifier_alert_instance.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_instance (
	instance_no bigint not null,
	alert_no int not null,
	status varchar(1) default 'U' not null,
	metadata varchar(3999) null,
	lgm_type varchar(1) null,
	target_status varchar(20) null,
    retry_count smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint default 0 not null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_inst primary key(instance_no)
)

knl_import_file_master.definition:
create table knl_import_file_master (
	file_no int not null,
	file_name varchar(127) not null,
	file_path varchar(511) not null,
	config_no smallint not null,
	domain_no int not null,  
	created_on bigint not null,
	created_by int not null,
	constraint pk_knl_impt_fl_mas primary key (file_no),
	constraint fk_impt_file_cfg
	foreign key (config_no)
	references knl_import_config (config_no),
	constraint fk_impt_file_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_function_config.definition:
create table knl_security_function_config (
	function_no int not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
    configurable varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	module_no smallint not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_func_cfg primary key (function_no, domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_func_cfg_func
	foreign key (function_no)
	references knl_security_function (function_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_func_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_func_mdl
	foreign key (module_no)
	references knl_license_product_module (module_no)
)

knl_client_native_server.definition:
create table knl_client_native_server (
	app_instance_id varchar(255) not null,
	ip_address varchar(20) not null,
	port_no smallint not null,
	cluster_id varchar(255) not null,
	server_type varchar(1) not null,
	server_name varchar(255) not null,
	created_on bigint not null,
	connection_count smallint not null,
	server_password varchar(255) not null,
	constraint pk_knl_cli_ntv_srvr primary key (app_instance_id, ip_address, port_no)
)

knl_security_user_attribute.definition:
create table knl_security_user_attribute (
	user_no int not null,
	attribute_id varchar(127) not null,
	attribute_value varchar(1023) null,
	attribute_type varchar(1) null,
	attribute_group_id varchar(50) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_usr_attr primary key (user_no, attribute_id),
	constraint fk_knl_user_def_attr
	foreign key (user_no)
	references knl_security_user (user_no)
)

knl_security_resource.definition:
create table knl_security_resource (
	resource_no int not null,
	product_no smallint default 1 not null,
	resource_id varchar(50) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	parent_resource_no int default 0 not null,
	enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_rsrc primary key (resource_no)
)

knl_security_profile_perm_ovrd.definition:
create table knl_security_profile_perm_ovrd (
	batch_no int default 0 not null,
	domain_id varchar(50) not null,
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	version varchar(20) not null,
	profile_id varchar(50) not null,
	function_id varchar(50) not null,
	negation varchar(1) not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_prm_ovrd primary key (batch_no, domain_id, product_id, version, profile_id, function_id)
)

knl_security_auth_token_mdata.definition:
create table knl_security_auth_token_mdata (
	token varchar(255) not null,
	domain_no int not null,
	client_jvm_name varchar(127) null,
	user_agent varchar(255) null,
	device_type varchar(1) null,
	public_ip varchar(127) null,
	network_ip varchar(127) null,
	other_details varchar(3999) null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_auth_tkn_mtd primary key (token),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_authmeta_dmn
	foreign key(domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition(domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_authmeta_token
	foreign key(token)
	references knl_security_auth_token(token)
)

knl_notifier_alert_lgminstance.definition:
create table knl_notifier_alert_lgminstance (
	instance_no bigint not null,
	metadata_key varchar(127) not null,
	metadata_value varchar(3999) null,
	constraint pk_knl_ntf_alrt_linst primary key(instance_no, metadata_key),
	constraint fk_knl_ntf_lgminst_to_inst
	foreign key(instance_no)
	references knl_notifier_alert_instance(instance_no)
)

knl_license_product_attribute.definition:
create table knl_license_product_attribute (
    product_no smallint default 0 not null,
    attribute_id varchar(127) not null,
	domain_no int default 0 not null,
    attribute_type varchar(1) null,
	attribute_value varchar(1023) null,
	override varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_lic_prod_attr primary key (product_no, attribute_id, domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_lic_prop_prodno
	foreign key (product_no)
	references knl_license_product(product_no)
)

knl_security_profile_attr.definition:
create table knl_security_profile_attr (
   profile_no int not null,
   attribute_id varchar(127) not null, 
   attribute_value varchar(1023) not null,
   created_on bigint null,
   updated_on bigint null,
   created_by int null,
   updated_by int null,
   constraint pk_knl_sec_prof_attr primary key (profile_no, attribute_id),
   constraint fk_knl_sec_prof_attr_prof
   foreign key (profile_no)
   references  knl_security_profile(profile_no)
)

knl_security_login_config.definition:
create table knl_security_login_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	max_active_logins smallint not null,
	case_sensitive_userid varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	captcha_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	device_privacy_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geolocation_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	geohistory_check_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	two_factor_enabled varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	two_factor_type varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	max_invalid_attempts smallint default 1 not null,
	forced_enabled varchar(1) default '1' not null,
	forced_captcha_attempt_no smallint default 1 not null,
	forced_two_factor_attempt_no smallint default 1 not null,
	forced_forgotpass_attempt_no smallint default 1 not null,
	forced_two_factor_type varchar(1) default '0' not null,
	sec_qns_weightage smallint default 100 not null,
	forced_sec_qns_weightage smallint default 100 not null,
	two_factor_email_template_no int default 0 not null,
	two_factor_sms_template_no int default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_login_cfg primary key (domain_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_login_def
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_security_profile_perm_ovd.definition:
create table knl_security_profile_perm_ovd (
   domain_id varchar(50) not null,
   product_id varchar(10) not null,
   version varchar(20) not null,
   profile_id varchar(50) not null,
   function_id varchar(50) not null,
   negation varchar(1) not null,
   created_on bigint null,
   updated_on bigint null,
   created_by int null,
   updated_by int null,
   constraint pk_knl_sec_prm_ovrd primary key (domain_id,product_id,version,profile_id,function_id)
)

knl_security_page.definition:
create table knl_security_page (
	page_no int not null,
	product_no smallint default 1 not null,
	page_id varchar(50) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	type varchar(1) not null,
	url varchar(511) not null,
    icon varchar(511) null,
	module_no smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_page primary key (page_no),
	constraint fk_knl_page_to_module
	foreign key (module_no)
	references knl_license_product_module (module_no)
)

knl_license_product.definition:
create table knl_license_product (
	product_no smallint not null,
	product_id varchar(10) not null,
	version varchar(20) not null,
	name varchar(127) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	external_i18n_key varchar(255) null,
	parent_product_no smallint default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_lic_prod primary key (product_no)
)

knl_security_page_los_config.definition:
create table knl_security_page_los_config(
	page_no int  not null,
	param_name varchar(50) not null,
	resolver_param_name varchar(50) null,
	validation_name varchar(25) not null,
	param_type varchar(1) default 'P' not null,
	data_type varchar(1) default 'S' not null,
	default_value varchar(200) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_page_los primary key (page_no,param_name,validation_name),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_page_los
	foreign key (page_no)
	references knl_security_page (page_no)
)

knl_security_page_func_map.definition:
create table knl_security_page_func_map (
	page_no int not null,
	function_no int not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_page_funcmap primary key (page_no, function_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_pgfuncmap_page
	foreign key (page_no)
	references knl_security_page (page_no),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_pgfuncmap_func
	foreign key (function_no)
	references knl_security_function (function_no)
)

knl_security_device_config.definition:
create table knl_security_device_config (
	domain_no int not null,
	device_type varchar(1) not null,
	valid_url_prefix varchar(511) null,
	valid_query_hosts varchar(511) null,
	query_request_ref_required varchar(1) default '1' not null,	
	max_active_logins smallint default 0 not null,
	login_success_url varchar(511) null,
	login_failure_url varchar(511) null,
	login_theme varchar(20) null,
	login_logo varchar(511) null,
	login_ui_template_no int default 0 not null,
	login_max_response_time smallint default 0 not null,
	max_invalidate_session_type varchar(1) default 'O' not null,
	forgot_success_url varchar(511) null,
	forgot_failure_url varchar(511) null,
	forgot_theme varchar(20) null,
	forgot_logo varchar(511) null,
	forgot_ui_template_no int default 0 not null,
	reset_success_url varchar(511) null,
	reset_failure_url varchar(511) null,
	reset_theme varchar(20) null,
	reset_logo varchar(511) null,
	reset_ui_template_no int default 0 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_sec_dvc_cfg primary key (domain_no, device_type),
	constraint fk_knl_sec_dvc_cfg_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references knl_security_definition (domain_no)
)

knl_import_config_params.definition:
create table knl_import_config_params (
	config_no smallint not null,
	param_id varchar(50) not null,
	param_index smallint not null,
	param_type varchar(20) not null,
	validation_config varchar(511) null,
	description varchar(127) null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,    
	constraint pk_knl_impt_cfg_param primary key (config_no, param_id)
)

knl_core_running_serial.definition:
create table knl_core_running_serial (
	domain_no int default 1 not null,
	name varchar(100) not null,
	description varchar(255) not null,
	running_no bigint default 1 not null,
	created_on bigint null,
	updated_on bigint null,
	created_by int null,
	updated_by int null,
	constraint pk_knl_cor_serial primary key (domain_no, name),
	constraint fk_knl_cor_srl_dmn
	foreign key (domain_no)
	references app_domain_definition (domain_no)
)
